commit message: Run proguard for the release build. Also removed some proguard config for old reader classes.
Removed mCommentHashes
Moved CommentAdapter to a separate class
Rewrote comment moderation & deletion
Use a view pager to hold the different stats tabs. Makes it possible to swipe between fragments, and it is animated.
Replaced custom moderation bar animation with existing flyIn/flyOut animation
Proguard: Keep R inner classes, so that the app can load resources from the drawable folders.
Too many freaky things happening right before launch with pro guard, going to make an issue to fix it up for 2.6.1
Preferences: split blogs section in wpcom/self-hosted
Moved comment table to separate class, added primary key to table
Comment-related cleanup
Renamed columns
remove unused strings

Revert 'Use a view pager to hold the different stats tabs. Makes it possible to swipe between fragments, and it is animated.'

This reverts commit 8fd4f23231792065b9e6208b998b3b41c5ece440.
Comment model now uses private Strings with getters/setters
Comments now store accurate publish date, making it easier to format dates for display. Also added caching of 'expensive' comment calculations to improve adapter performance.
First pass at contextual ActionBar (CAB)
2nd pass at contextual ActionBar (CAB)
Confirmation is now required before deleting/spamming comments.
Added a quick fade between fragment transactions in StatsAbsPagedViewFragment. Fixed janky replacement animation by setting the min height of the container to its current height.
fix #772: npe in create account page with a certain timing, when a user create an account and hit back just before completion
Merge branch 'develop' into issue/552-beta-group-dedicated-app
fix whitespaces
CAB now disables items as appropriate, added COLNAME_IS_HIDDEN to WordPressDB to avoid hard-coding column name in CommentTable.java
fix #773: npe updateblogoptions
CAB now fades disabled menu items
CommentAdapter now uses an AsyncTask to load comments from SQLite
Updated to support landscape tablets
Increased comment row margins, now updating comments correctly the first time
Refresh task now uses executeOnExecutor() when possible.
Post titles are now unescaped for display
Moved comment date to the right to match reader comments, added extra whitespace

Fixed up UX for StatsVisitorsAndViewsFragment:

* Extracted out the bar char views into their own fragment. This allows the data below the chart to only be loaded once (instead of loaded in 3 separate fragments like it was previously)
* Fixed wonky reload of bar chart data. Instead of removing all of the views, we just check for an existing bar graph and update its data if it exists.
Fixes margin between radio group and chart
Matching up tablet layout for stats visitors and views to use new container and radio buttons.
Ensure we aren’t inserting a string outside of the length of the content editable string. Fixes #780.
Don’t proceed with downloading external media if the method arguments are null. Most likely the cause of this was that the activity had finished.

Catch an IndexOutOfBoundsException when creating the copy of the post content's editable. If the exception is caught we'll just use the post content EditText's current editable. Only drawback to this is that there's a quick flash of HTML displayed as the post is saving.

Also cleaned up a few compiler warnings.
Removed a ViewPager instance and TabListener that wasn't being used. Props @nbradbury

Convert Emoji to the wp_smile when it is available on WordPress, otherwise convert it to the HTML numeric entity.
Strips invalid characters out when the serialization fails.
Fixed the instanceof check in WPHtml to use WPImageSpan. Fixes #798
Comment editing now works and correctly updates both the detail and list fragments
Clock noticon is now centered vertically, also updated style definition for dates to use the clock drawable (previously the clock drawable was added to each date label).
Changed 'delete' to 'trash'
Reduced the size of the progress indicator when loading more comments
Fixed capitalization of trash/spam buttons and dialogs
Avatars in comment list now line up with the start of the divider

Fixed bug that caused comment list not to reflect moderation change made in comment detail when detail was closed before moderation completed. Note, though, that there may be delay before the list reflects the change if the network request is slow.

Soft keyboard is now hidden when leaving the comment detail fragment
Avatars are now more closely aligned with the top of the text
Tweaked comment rows - fewer lines of text, more obvious dividers
The fix for the missing 'mystery man' avatar I committed earlier didn't work, and it turns out this bug affected the app in several place. This commit fixes all of those.
